DOC.brief_summary: This study examine effect 8 month Yoga train bone density bone turnover marker premenopausal woman , age 35-50 year . The style Yoga use power Yoga involve posture jump component . The investigator hypothesize Yoga intervention would result beneficial improvement bone turnover marker , increase bone formation marker decrease bone resorption marker .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Yoga Bone Metabolism Premenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: participant engage resistance training Yoga exercise least 12 month prior study chronic back joint problem cardiovascular disease take antihypertensive drug medication affect bone density take hormonal contraception selfreported regular menstrual cycle . body weight 300 pound
